tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_tracking_data (
  satellite_id INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  latitude DECIMAL(8, 6) NOT NULL,
  longitude DECIMAL(9, 6) NOT NULL,
  altitude DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (satellite_id, timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_tracking_data (
  satellite_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT,
  altitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE future_satellite_positions (
  prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id INT,
  prediction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  predicted_latitude FLOAT,
  predicted_longitude FLOAT,
  predicted_altitude FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES satellite_tracking_data(satellite_id)
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_tracking_data (
    satellite_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    altitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_positions (
    position_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    predicted_latitude FLOAT,
    predicted_longitude FLOAT,
    predicted_altitude FLOAT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_satellite_id FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES satellite_tracking_data(satellite_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tracking_data (
    tracking_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id UUID NOT NULL,
    tracking_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    latitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
    longitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
    altitude FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (tracking_id, satellite_id)
);

CREATE TABLE predictive_model (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id UUID NOT NULL,
    model_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    trained_date DATE NOT NULL,
    accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE predicted_positions (
    prediction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id UUID NOT NULL,
    prediction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    predicted_latitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
    predicted_longitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
    confidence_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE PredictedPositions (
  prediction_id INT,
  satellite_id INT,
  predicted_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  predicted_latitude FLOAT,
  predicted_longitude FLOAT
);
